comments.author: bugs@andreasn.se
comments.text:
Spinning off Bug 655202
We're missing some padding between stuff like Sender, User-Agent, Date etc when Headers are set to "All" on the mac and this makes it not line up with From, Subject and To headers.
comments.creator: bugs@andreasn.se
comments.raw_text:
Spinning off Bug 655202
We're missing some padding between stuff like Sender, User-Agent, Date etc when Headers are set to "All" on the mac and this makes it not line up with From, Subject and To headers.
